cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 11th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 11th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 inch spring mattresses made up with quality linen, all bunks are laid out top to tail; with lockers in-between offering you some privacy.  All rooms have access to FREE unlimited Wi-Fi, fridge, and each bed contains our unique Power Up Poin

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 6 inch spring mattresses made up with quality linen, all bunks are laid out  top to tai; with lockers in-between offering you some privacy.  All rooms have access to FREE unlimited Wi-Fi, fridge, and each bed contains our unique Power Up Poin

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: All rooms includ a super king sized bed made with quality linen, personal smart TVs, FREE unlimited Wi-Fi, tea and coffee, and fridge. The private ensuite bathrooms along with a shower and toilet include towels, soap and shampoo.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
